title: Problems with running a program
body:
Hello guys. I'm new here and I don't know **ANYTHING** about lol, so I have a problem with running program. I start game with bots because I'm a newbie and when it starts a screen just stopped. I must turn it off in power button because it doesn't response on commands. I hope you'll help me :)
Also I'm not very good at English I hope you will unsderstand a point xD

**Specifications are: Intel core i3-5005U (2.0 GHz, 3MB L3 Cache), Intel HD Graphics 5500, 4 GB DDR3 L Memory and 500 GB HDD.**

replies.body: It's working. Thank a lot. I hope the game will be good just like in videos.

Welcome!  This freezing issue has been a common problem for some players on Windows 10.  A recent update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing what you're explaining.  Disabling the bar should help!  Let me know if this isn't the case for you.
